overview: Adam Galper joined Xtime in 2002 to spearhead the development and delivery of ServiceCRM. Adam oversees engineering, sets technology strategy, and steers overall product architecture. A serial entrepreneur, he has previously founded two venture-backed enterprise software startups that have been acquired by Oracle and Microsoft. In addition to twenty-five years of product development experience in government, life sciences, high-tech manufacturing, and automotive, Adam has published research in a variety of academic disciplines, including bioinformatics and probabilistic reasoning. He has degrees in Computer Science, Biochemistry, and Biomedical Informatics from Yale College and Stanford University.
